item.title: By: sqlsister
item.dc:creator: sqlsister
item.content:encoded:
I love the use of FOR XML Path to get a comma delimited lists that we need for reporting.

And you didn’t mention them specifically so I’ll mention recursive CTES.

SSIS is harder than DTS but does so much more. And hooray for Fuzzy matching in it!!!

I also like CTEs and cross apply. I would love using the date datatype (It would be so much easier to query if we didn’t have to worrry with time for many of our purposes) but we have all the dates we need right now in datetime and that’s not going to change, but if I was designing a new database, I’d use date! And varchar(max) is just so much easier.

I’ll bet you can tell I’m a data analyst and not a dba!
